Name: Legacy - Witch Island 3
About the game: Your next hidden object adventure on Witch Island is about to begin! You’ve learned that parallel worlds exist and that they are inextricably linked – what happens to a someone in one world will similarly affect the other. To save your own world, you must take flight with a magical swan and begin a new journey that will take you through picturesque lands to free animals from the evil witch’s magic! It’s up to you now, to take on these unique puzzle challenges to stop the witch and save both worlds from certain destruction! - Beautiful landscapes across an enchanted forest - Multiple logic-based mini games - Unconventional hidden object puzzles
